wikitext.*:
'''Urui''' is the eighth month of the calendar of the [[Dúnedain]]. It was also called [[Úrimë]] in [[Quenya]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref> The first element of the name, ''Ur-'', is derived from Sindarin ''ûr'' "fire, heat".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 396, entry UR-; {{S|Appendix}}, entry ''ur-''; {{PE|21}} p. 71.</ref> The second element ''-ui'' is a common adjectival ending,<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 87.</ref> also present in other Sindarin names of the months.<ref>Cf. [[Nínui]], [[Nórui]], [[Hithui]].</ref>
